website_summaries.verdict: Good carpet cleaning power for a good price.
pros: Features 6 rows of rotating power brushes
Spraying crevice tool is great for upholstery
One-gallon tank means less time spent refilling
cons: Some buyers had issues with this cleaner breaking down after a few weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Great first experience with Bissel Carpet Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and used it right away. It worked really well. I didn’t find it too heavy. I cleaned it afterwards and it was pretty easy. I was shocked at how black the water was. My carpet was dirtier than I thought. You can tell when you’ve run out of solution because the window doesn’t show any water moving even though you are spraying and then trying to suck up the water, there won’t be any , so you know it’s time to refill. So for now I’m very happy and my carpet smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer cleaner I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of steam cleaners over the years of various brands. We have pets and kids and just life....also I have white carpet. This machine works great and I love that it isn't heavy to carry and that it is narrow so it can clean the smaller spaces. The attached tools are super helpful and work great to clean furniture. The tank system is easy to use. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: lovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK - TERRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t clean well. Extremely difficult to see how much dirty water/soap is left. Extremely difficult to empty completely and impossible to clean. RUINED A RUG: I was using the upholstery attachment to clean our sofa, and the bottom of the unit ruined a rug near our sofa (looks like the unit chewed through the carpet, yet I was only using upholstery attachment) — see photos (damage circled in blue).
customer_reviews.author: SiSoyYo

customer_reviews.title: Mark Bissell your 1887,1956 Proheat Carpet Cleaner design and QC is in trouble.
customer_reviews.text: Mark Bissell: Two problems out of the box that buyers need to know: (1) The assembly and usage instructions are printed with tiny dark unusable photos of the product making the instructions useless; and (2) The flex hose and Crevice Tool cannot be installed as shown in the instructions Product View because the flex hose attachment is installed on the handle upside down and the hose is too long to wrap around the Power Cord rack. This means you have to wrap the flex hose around the front of the handle. Also, there is no way to remove the flex hose. Hope these design and QC problems are not indicative of how well this thing is going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to shampoo my hallway & part of the living room before I heard a loud noise. I called Bissell for support thinking it was the belt. After troubleshooting with them we found out it was the actual brush that malfunctioned. The warranty doesn’t cover the belts or brush because it’s “normal wear”. They dud replace mine because I freaked out since this was the 1st use, but I wish I would have kept the box to just return it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Dead after an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it 0-star. It stopped working after using it for an hour, and Amazon doesn't accept return of this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Lim

customer_reviews.title: You should by this
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! This item works WONDERS! First time ever owning a carpet cleaner and I absolutely love it. Easy to assemble and quick to take in and out for messy clean up. Handheld assessory is perfect for those tuff to get out stains. Before and after shots. Could have kept going to get more out.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: Broke before the year
customer_reviews.text: I've had bad luck with my bissell, I bought it March 2018 and took it in for repair because it wouldn't suction at all, turns out I need a new water pump and a belt... they want to charge me 90.00. I honestly dont think it's worth considering I paid 127.00
customer_reviews.author: susie alcantar

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those appliances that you can assemble and use without ever opening the instruction booklet- it's so intuitive and simple. I used to use an older model, and this one is even easier. As an owner of many pets, I HIGHLY recommend a carpet shampooer with the handheld attachment for cleaning small areas. It totally works to lift debris out of carpet and upholstery. My one complaint is that when I finish using it and move it to another room to put away, it sometimes drips a little of the dirty water, which is awful, because the purpose of the product is to get dirt off my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Butler

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Within 15 minutes of assembling the product it was broken. I called Bissell, they offered to ship a new part, which I will need to install, but shipping will take 3 weeks. I would advise against buying Bissell as their product is trash. Amazon made this issue right when I called them by shipping a replacement within 4 days. While I may dislike Bissell now, due to a lack of quality control, Amazon continues to earn my business.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Makes life much easier and cleans EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! We use it for everything from cleaning carpet, rugs, furniture and vehicle interiors. It makes a noticeable difference cleaning but doesn't overly wet the floors. For assistance, we can clean our rugs while they still are on the hardwood floor and the hardwood doesn't get wet but the rug is much whiter. We previously had a larger capacity one but have never had an issue with the smaller water reservoir in this one and it's much easier to move around, carry upstairs, etc. The separate hose cleaner attachment is what sold us on this more than anything and allows us to clean our car seats and couches with the same cleaner. I'd highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Birfield85

customer_reviews.title: Broke with VERY minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I used my carpet cleaner 3 times for very small areas and when to clean a spot and it stopped working! So very disappointed in this product. When it worked it cleaned well. But I didn't even get to clean a whole room. Wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so happy
customer_reviews.text: so I owned Bissell 1548. It was heavy the tools never worked and quite frankly the double canisters for me felt like extra work. I was tired of it leaking and being heavy so after three years I threw it out. I got the Bissell 1887 and omg It was LIGHT and did an excellent deep cleaning. I got out 4 stains that were red and well over a year old in my sons room. I will say I had to do my sons room, a small foyer, and a flight of stairs so I had to fill the machine twice. Guess what I didn't mind it's way less annoying than the Bissell 1548. I highly recommend! Excellent Deep Cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Tarutastic

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this ten stars! The best carpet scrubber I ever use/owned and I have had several, half a dozen Hoovers and none compare to this one. I used it as soon as I received it and WOW! I am very happy with it! In the past I spent over twice as much for the Hoovers and it went in the trash! This unit took butter out of a rug! I'm a happy man!
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Renews soiled carpet
customer_reviews.text: WE used it on 16yr old carpets that hadn't been shampooed for several years. Not only did the shampooer remove the soil and brighten the carpet, after the carpet dried we vacuumed it and noticed that the texture had visibly improved. As far as usability, the main criticism I have is that it somewhat difficult to tell when the cleaning solution has run out. You have to keep a close eye on the return flow - when it stops, it's time to refill. An indicator light would be a useful improvement. For occasional household use, consider this as a candidate.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Scavone

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with the bladder engineering
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Construction seems a bit chintzy. Not sure if this will hold up past 3 years. All plastic. The reservoir doubles as an intake. The reservoir to expel cleaning solution is called a “bladder.” The thin “bladder” bag deflates as the fluid is expelled and makes room for the post Intake. My concern is that the plastic for the expandable bladder will eventually dry rot or wear out. Not impressed with engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene B. Hamilton III

customer_reviews.title: Trash, i am very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Stay away People. It is a bad product choice, because the one that i received, came with a broken Belt and cannot Spray the Water.
customer_reviews.author: Creedlyn Creed Robillard

customer_reviews.title: Easy and good.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. No harder than vacuuming, just have to go over the area a couple times while it sucks out the water (this is expected). Area is fairly dry after proper use. Rug is fluffy and softer. Color of carpet looks newer. Seems to get out pet hair (vacuumed first)
customer_reviews.author: For Simon

customer_reviews.title: found out you can suck up just as much water with the hose attachment ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this, found out you can suck up just as much water with the hose attachment as you can with the base, after running the base over the area to suck up the water multiple times, definitely a flaw. Works decently other than that, hope it has durability and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: I HATE THIS. two weeks and two different red cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: I HATE THIS. two weeks and two different red cheap plastics have broken. now it will not disperse water let alone hot water. waste of money. also its super heavy and does nt turn corners unless turne off and picked up.
customer_reviews.author: karen k.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, awkward handle, rough on hands
customer_reviews.text: I used this yesterday for first time on all my carpeting. I like everything very much except: 1) Upholstery brush attachment keeps falling off machine while in use. That’s a nuisance. 2) Within the first hour I had to put on a gardening glove to keep from getting blisters. Though it looks cool, that handle is way out of balance. The right place to really push from is about in the middle, not the end, I practiced for three hours trying to get a comfortable grip, and it’s just not there. For as often as I’ll use it, I’m not returning it, But I won’t re-purchase. For my price range, this is still a very good cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Mojosaica

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing machine! I thought we would have to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing machine! I thought we would have to replace our carpets after years of pets and children but they look nearly brand new after using this machine. It was very easy, loved being able to see when clean water was being "sucked up" and took nearly no time to dry when used as directed. I wish I had taken before and after pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Schleigh

customer_reviews.title: Having issues with it after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: Only have had for a little over 3mo and having issues with loud noise coming from it😔 I believe this is a motor issue and its out of return date that I can return. Hate that I have only used this a few times and not happy with the overall product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So worth buying !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner is so easy to use and it really does get out stains in carpeting. I had old urine stains from my puppy in my blue carpeting and they came out so easily!! I thought I would need to rip the carpeting out but no more...the carpet looks almost new!! I highly recommend this product to anyone thinking of hiring an outside company to clean floors and/or carpet...It is so easy to handle and you get the satisfaction of doing the job yourself!!!
customer_reviews.author: AIMSTER

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Got the carpet clean. Pouring out the dirty water sucks because the clean water cap doesn't seal entirely. The dirty water tank is smaller than the clean water tank so when you pour it out you'll lose some of your clean water solution. Also, the way it pours out the back corner leaves you prone to getting dirty water on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sublate

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine without the soap as the soap will stay in the carpet and then attract more dirt. I have used it twice and the traffic lanes are coming out. But you really have to clean the machine, including the brush, really well after each use so that it continues to work well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When Bissell Says Deep Cleaning, They Mean DEEP CLEANING!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs and regularly steam clean my carpets. My old steamer broke after less than 4 months (a different brand), so I decided to try BISSELL'S PROHEAT 1887 this time. WOW! I was AMAZED! My carpets weren't even the correct shade this entire time! Bissell Proheat did such a deep and wonderful clean on my carpets! The carpet is now softer to walk on and a beautiful shade of tan! I didn't realize my carpets were that dirty and dingy because I'm constantly steam cleaning them and they've never been this clean! Thank you Bissell! I'm your newest most loyal customer...from now on I will ONLY purchase a Bissell!!
customer_reviews.author: By Danimaria

customer_reviews.title: Simply, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans real good. Drys fast, dosent take for ever to do rugs...3 suggestions, use there chemicals, wash after every use, after shampooing rugs, go back over it w REAL HOT WATER---NO SOAP. brings more to top of rug. Usually after doing rugs, stains return few weeks later...try it..
customer_reviews.author: Karen Turbush

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the pros.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a work horse works great my carpet looks new. Pays for itself after 1 use. I used this machine to clean up behind a professional cleaner that done the carpet about 6 Months ago they must have left soap in the carpet or something because it just kept attracting dirt even in the areas no one was going. Buy it you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Best little carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Bissell always makes a great product. This is my second carpet cleaner by Bissell. The first one miraculously lasted for 6 years through numerous grandchildren, three dogs and more then a dozen foster dogs. The key to getting a good result when shampooing is to thoroughly vacuum several times before shampooing avoiding clogs in your machine. I would totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Does more than expected. Easy to use. This carpet had several year of dog and animal stains. ( Not our house) With a little effort and multiple passes (until you think you're comfortable with the result) you'll get good results. I give it a 5 star rating. Be sure to clean hair from the brush after each use. Also be sure to use hot, hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra and Matt

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The placement of the water tank - clean water tank inside of another tank that holds dirty water - makes it impossible to see clean water level. Leaks worse the 7 year old cleaner that I was trying to replace and sometimes even the dirty water leaks out. As far as cleaning - it does ok but I expected much better for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA HENSLEY

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for three times and then quit suctioning water
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for three times and then quit suctioning water. Called their hotline and spent frustrating time talking to someone on the other side of the world who talked too fast and had a bad connection too. They sent a part that would supposedly fix the problem but it did not. I bought a new belt and replaced it with great difficulty and that fixed that problem.
customer_reviews.author: joan smola

customer_reviews.title: Water tank is garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cleaner expecting a quality product, Disappointed to say the least. Used four times (Of course emptying and refilling per directions) and on the fifth time upon removing the water tank from the machine, the lid/bottom of the tank fell apart, upon inspection the LID clasp had broken off a large section of the tank making the entire assembly useless. Thin plastic and poor engineering results in replacing the tank. Assuming this will happen with the replacement tank as well (That I had to pay for) I would spend my money elsewhere. Hope I saved someone some hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this product I looked at many reviews. this was one of the best reviews, it did not disappoint. I have 3 dogs, small, but 3. I use this about every other week and it keeps my carpet looking like new & it's about 10 years old. Thank you for the reviews to be able to make an educational decision.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy this one...
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Bissell products, this is the second unit we have ordered, 2 different types, and sadly had to return them both. First off the cord isn't long enough to use in an apartment, second the suction to pick up the dirt and water isn't strong enough to leave the carpet clean, and third the unit we received the front plate, the suction piece, kept falling off. Luckily we own a large professional cleaner, I had to take that out to finish the job. Just what I wanted to AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: aNDREW tHORPE

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've used it for two apartments and am very pleased. Easy to fill and empty, and fairly easy to maneuver. Carpeting looked like new when I was done.
customer_reviews.author: Abra Cadabra

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really great! I've tried Hoover and Bissell and I'd have to say I still prefer Bissell does a good job and doesn't leave the carpet sopping wet, dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: ... my carpet for about a year now it works great I love the heating element that's in it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cleaning machine for my carpet for about a year now it works great I love the heating element that's in it to help dry the carpet does not does not leave my carpet soaked and wet very good quality and will last year's to come highly recommended easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: MS.B

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!  DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this 1 time. I was about halfway through shampooing my living room floor and it quit working. Amazon will not return it. Bissell is not replying to my emails.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Really good machine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this Machine for several months and used it 4 times to clean carpets. The machine is easy to use for both carpets and furniture. It is very easy to clean and seems to be rugged enough to withstand several years of use. I read through a lot of reviews prior to purchasing this one and it didn’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Gary UT

customer_reviews.title: Not good for carpets
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do good job, after a while start throwing the clogs out, you to pickup and its very heavy to use as well as involves lot of after cleaning activity for he vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guess I got a bum machine
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice easy to put together not heavy at all but it does lose suction power. And you will have to refill quite often as the Track will be small making you use more water for a large woman having to refill constantly great if you can get it to work and you don't mind refilling constantly
customer_reviews.author: Atkinskid

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this cleaner for many years. I used it when I lived in a sandy area with 18 dachshunds! I obviously used it more often than most people do, so went through several over the years. Now I live in a normal environment, with no animals, and have still chosen it over having a professional cleaning company. I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Dannelly

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT. NO PROBLUMS AT ALL ...
customer_reviews.text: OUR FRONT ROOM CARPET HAD NOT BEEN CLEANED / SHAMPOOED IN MANY, MANY YEARS. WE RAISED 6 KIDS HERE IN THIS HOME!!! THIS THING SUCKED UP TONS OF DIRT. WATER WAS NEARLY BLACK! HAD TO GO OVER SEVERAL TIMES... MADE A BIG DIFFERENCE IN THE DUST IN OUR HOME. I HAD NO PROBLEMS WITH THE THING AT ALL !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old one
customer_reviews.text: So I was trying to help my mom out by deep cleaning her carpet and broke her old clunky shampooer. We decided to order this one and were very pleased by how much lighter it was. My only complaint is that the hand attachment doesn’t stay attached to the machine when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Zavi's Mami

customer_reviews.title: They did pretty well, but it was still dirty from the ...
customer_reviews.text: We paid a company to clean our carpets when we moved into our new house because we didnt have a carpet cleaner yet. They did pretty well, but it was still dirty from the previous tenants dog. Using this three times has made the carpet look brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hileman

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to fill and the clean up is easier than
customer_reviews.text: We have used this a few times and it really delivers. Really easy to fill and the clean up is easier than expected
customer_reviews.author: Nick V.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a Few Minutes
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was a piece of junk. Lasted a few minutes, then died. Checked for any issues, obstructions, etc. Nothing. Cleaned every part of it and the vaccum would not turn back on. Amazon came through with a return/refund. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Silver

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product for the price. Super easy to use. Requires some assembly out of the box, but super simple to follow. My carpet dried super fast and came out cleaner than when I borrowed a comparable shampooer from a family member, in past. It’s good sized, but feels lighter weight than you’d expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great all around carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a carpet cleaner for our carpets, upholstery and vehicles. I can say this was a great purchase! The upholstery attachment looks cheap but actually works very good, could be a little bigger but no complaints. Used the upholstery attachment on the interior of both vehicles and WOW! What a difference it made. Worked great on the carpets as well. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Meade

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended Bisselpet cleanerw/ febreeze it smelled/cleaned amazingly.
customer_reviews.text: There was only a few things that needed to be assembled and very is to do. Used it for the first time today and it worked great. Easy to fill and dump water... I bought bissel pet cleaner and it smelled great and removed stains perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SpiffieTiffie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1200 sqft apartment and this cleaner takes care of the whole place! I only have to change out the water twice. It cleans great and sucks up the dog hair like crazy (it's gross too), but my carpets always look great after wards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this to your house.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Very good deal. Heavy duty. This is my third one in twenty years. Cleans and handles well, lightweight and assembles in three steps. Could last longer with simple repairs but I don't have the time. Just get another.
customer_reviews.author: David Pagel

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning my carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So far have cleaned carpet threw whole house. Two bedrooms and living room. Did a great job. Wasn’t hard to put together. Very happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This Bissell was easy to assemble, easy to use and easy to clean up afterwards. I had cleaned my rug with my old machine and it did not come out well. I bought this new Bissell and was very pleased (and a bit shocked) at all the dirt that came up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search of a great shampooer and had no luck with anyone I'd buy.....but this one is absolutely amazing I love it!! Has amazing suction power and the brush deep cleans stain all the way out !! I highly recommend this bissel!!
customer_reviews.author: Samanths

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product so far
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product because of the ease of assembly and use. As with all Bissell products, they are well made and perform as advertised when used within the design limits and manufacturer's requirements for cleaning and maintaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet use
customer_reviews.text: Have an English mastiff and the carpets get pretty dirty with debis that the regular vacuum just won’t pick up. Assembly was really easy and it did a great job cleaning the carpet, you could see the difference in color after it had dried between rooms. The only partial bad of this is the container for the clean and dirty water doesn’t last as long as I thought but I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I bought another one the same Bissell
customer_reviews.text: We used it to clean up after our dogs that were old and my Son also used it for his dogs it worked great then burned up Don’t get the protection plan because what you have to do to send it back was not worth it through it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: The only negative comment is the weight of the machine but that is why it does such a great job of suction! The older one that I had like this one was difficult to empty the dirty water bladder. The improved corner empty is great, than you Bissell!
customer_reviews.author: RuthHome

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, strong suction so the carpet dries quickly if you follows the instructions. Cleans a 14 x 14 area thoroughly before needing to be emptied.
customer_reviews.author: e099602

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carpet cleaner, stop looking around and purchase this Bissell.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best carpet shampooer I've ever used. Would definitely recommend it. It is easy to use and pretty easy to clean up. Carpet looks fantastic afterwards. Just follow the manufacturer's instructions and the carpet will be dry in a matter of hours instead of a day. The spot attachment is also a great addition and works perfectly and getting close to baseboards and other hard-to-reach areas. And when purchasing from Amazon, you have nothing to lose. Enjoy, vroom vroom...
customer_reviews.author: BWolf

customer_reviews.title: Works a lot better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works a lot better than expected! Just wish the tank was a bit larger so you don't have to dump and refill as often.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Feaser

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that gets the carpet semi-clean
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that gets the carpet semi-clean. With limited mobility and having a bad back it is hard for me to push the carpet cleaner back-and-forth but it does do a good job so I just do a little bit at a time
customer_reviews.author: sandy l

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT add boiling water..... unless you have pliers....
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! ...Unfortunately i assembled it and forgot to warn my sister about no boiling water so after the first use the soft plastic tub came out of place after it all cooled down. With some pliers we were able to get it back in place and havent had issues since. Giving it 5 stars since it survived our user error and still gets stains out really well! Lesson fully learned.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAmazonUser85

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small houses
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a small to mid size home. This is not comparable to a commercial type but it does the job for me. I did have an issue with the motor almost immediately, however, Amazon refunded me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Pittie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new apartment. Glad I bought this. The amount of dirt that came out if the carpet was crazy. No issues with the machine. Everything works great. Went out and bought a Bissell vacuume after this!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kalb

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have light carpets that you can see literally everything on and I have a baby so you get the picture. It works great with pre treating stains before and it sucks up water not leaving the carpet soaking wet
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rc

customer_reviews.title: ONE TANK, GROSS! Also NO RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: THIS CLEANER SHARES ONE TANK FOR BOTH CLEAN AND DIRTY WATER, Meaning that your spray reserve is made up of filthy waste water, - IMO VERY DISGUSTING. Terrible Lame Design. Also be warned -Item was not returnable . I made a fuss and was refunded, then put it out on the curb.
customer_reviews.author: superniki

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB LIKE A PROFESSIONAL.
customer_reviews.text: We use our Bissell several times a year to do a thorough job on our carpets. Not only does it get the dirt out but the dog and cat hair as well. The proof of just how dirty my carpets are is in the reservoir! Leaves my carpets not only looking clean but smelling fresh!
customer_reviews.author: DDJTJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My new carpet cleaner arrived yesterday. Was very easy to put together. Cleaned my entire main floor carpets and it worked great. The machine is light, easy to move around the house and to go up and down the stairs. After my first use I am very pleased with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: The place I live at use to be my fathers. I took over his lease after he passed. It hadn't been carpet cleaned in at least 5 years. After using this, going over the carpet a few times, the carpet is impressively and noticeably cleaner! I have yet to use it on my couch, but if it cleans the couch like it did the floor I will be even more impressed! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kratos

customer_reviews.title: What it's supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: so far so good out of the box easy to install put together turned it on the motor worked but I haven't used it yet but I'm assuming like most Bissell products it's going to be fine
customer_reviews.author: marcus v

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice
customer_reviews.text: The belt needs replaced after every 5 uses. The suction lacks. The solution spay gets stuck. Very frustrating with this purchase. When it works it’s good but more often it doesn’t work. Then when it does it leaks dirty water in clean carpet. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Weisberg

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is a great carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great carpet cleaner. Light weight, easy to set up and use and clean afterwards. Did a great job on my 15 year old "white" (now brown) carpet, much better than the Rug Doctor I rented from a local grocery store. I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was re-taped indicating that it was previously opened. The screws for assembling the product are missing. Also the manual. Therefore, the product is completely useless
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Eberts

customer_reviews.title: works great. went over the carpet the first time with ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. went over the carpet the first time with just plain water to get up any lose dirt and get carpet wet. then went over it again with the detergent in the water and you wouldn't believe the dirt that it got out of the carpet. I was amazed at the amount of dirt as I thought my carpet was always kept clean by just a vacuuming each week. easy to assemble handle and attachment bracket. the 8oz. bottle of detergent that came with it went a long way. would highly recommend both the carpet cleaner and the detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jones

customer_reviews.title: Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as described. Did clean carpet good, some spots started to come back, may it is the operator and not the machine. Overall it is a good machine. Fast shipment and good seller.
customer_reviews.author: healthyone

customer_reviews.title: Does not suck up liquid.
customer_reviews.text: With only minimal usye this product does NOT suck up liquids. I want a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Dreppard

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have a small dog who sometimes has accidents here and there. I used it to clean my apartment w he. I moved out and the job was so good I got my full deposit back. Great for small home daycares or people with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Taniesha Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner - Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Finally not to worry about the stains in the carpet. Kids activities are always fun to do but cleaning isn't but thanks to carpet cleaner. All stains are cleaned up and carpet looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: An amazing cleaner works great
customer_reviews.text: Works so well on tough stains that you would never know they were there in the first place. And with the recommend cleaner for tough stains I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kasmira Y. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner does a fantastic job. It assembles easily and works perfect for our needs. I gave it a four only because I don't like to give fives ( I want them to try to improve) Recommended buy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Great product does a job better than if you hired a company to do it. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My son in law used this and said it works great, better than when they hired someone to do their floors. It operates easily and is light weight. It gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Seys

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase so far!
customer_reviews.text: Suction and cleaning power is great. Have to get used to not holding handle to administer shampoo too long as it puts solution out a lot. But suction really gets it up, just have to run over it several times. Just remember to think about where you're going to store the machine. Shipment was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Economic, great to have around
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum, not as powerful for old deep stains, as suction is a bit weak and it's a bit heavy, but for the budget option is perfect and a good compromise given the price.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty good, while it worked. Using only bissel brand cleaners, and spending about 30 minutes cleaning it after every use and it stopped working in less than a year. Very dissatisfied with it's longevity.
customer_reviews.author: keven ragan

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional with hand tools
customer_reviews.text: Great. Heavy so it does get close to carpet. One container, middle for cleaning solution, outside of container is the dirty water. Easy to use and picks up pet hair. Hand tools work great. Super easy to change too hand tools. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it cleans really well
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and did a nice cleaning on a very high traffic carpet. Impressive. Almost as good as the cleaning I got from Stanley Steemers. Very much worth it. I hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Renato V.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but heavy duty cleaning power. Easy to load water chamber, easy to clean. Pulls up most of the water so drying is faster
customer_reviews.author: Ginica

customer_reviews.title: Carpets came clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it one time so far but it works very well. Way better than hoover's junk products. I read lots of reviews on this one and I see some that say it don't pick up all the water. Well duh! Carpet will retain some of the water. I did my carpets late in the afternoon and they were completely dry in the morning. Excellent product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bissell makes the best as far as I am concerned products (shampooers and vacs) for pets..
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: I works great and cleans very well. Its a bit heavy after a while. My 13 yr old daughter helped me clean the carpets in thw house so it very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Medusa

customer_reviews.title: Not enough suction
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, Just not enough suction to put the water back out. It takes many hours for your carpeting to dry, even after going back over it several times.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: It does a excellent job even on the stairs  with a rug
customer_reviews.text: It does a excellent job on the rugs i would recommend this the other one we had didnt do half as good its the best rug cleaner
customer_reviews.author: john schembri

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine! So happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine! So happy with it! I didn't really expect it to do as great as it did! We moved into a house 4 years ago with lith beige carpet in the bedrooms! This is the first time we cleaned the carpets! And I had to spot clean with greased lighting from home depot. But how amazing the carpets turned out after the spotting and cleaning! It was more than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: bobbie cassella

customer_reviews.title: Pulled out of the box and works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Pulled out of the box and works like a champ, until...the 4th refill, the snap-lock from the tank to the lid broke off the bucket (with part of the bucket, loss of all suction) I'm contacting Bissell and see what they can do...but the first day?!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together with hardly any assembly required. This is a great product. I shampooed approximately 1,500 sq ft so far and very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Helped my allergies so much. You can really feel the suction power. Never one to write reviews so know this is me really happy with this. We avoid buying new cause our want to not only limit waist but because our kids were young and broke everything we own. Still have the kids an they used it without breaking it. Winner in our book.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

product_meta.title: BISSELL Proheat Essential Carpet Cleaner and Carpet Shampooer, 1887,Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:ProHeatWith the Bissell proheat essential carpet cleaning system you can easily get out the embedded dirt, stains, allergens, and odors that vacuums can't reach. The rotating dirt Lifter power brush and a pressurized spray gently loosen and lift dirt from your carpet, surprising you with just how much comes out. The patented 2-in-1 tank system makes carpet cleaning easy with fewer trips to the sink. Exclusive heatwave technology helps maintain water temperature throughout the carpet cleaning process. See how great your carpets can look and feel. Based on particle size. Buying this product saves pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
feature_bullets: Every BISSELL purchase helps save pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
Strong spray and powerful suction removes dirt, allergens and odors embedded in carpets. Power Rating: 6 amps
Large capacity tanks (1 Gallon) mean less time filling and more time cleaning. An 8 ounce trial size bottle of professional formula is included
Features cleaning path of 11 inches approximately and also the power cord length of 22 feet approximately
6 cleaning rows of rotating power brushes plus edge sweep brushes loosen and remove deep dirt from carpets
Tough stain tool and spraying crevice tool are perfect for spot cleaning and upholstery; Power Source: Corded. Hose Length: 7 feet

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
